Item.name: COMMUNITY_PROJECT_FORUM_ROLLUP
Item.sqlserver_body:
CREATE TRIGGER [COMMUNITY_PROJECT_FORUM_ROLLUP] ON [innovator].[CP_FORUM_REPLY] FOR INSERT AS /* This trigger checks updates the CP_Forum.replies based on an update to this table. */
BEGIN UPDATE [CP_FORUM] SET replies= (select count(created_on) from [CP_FORUM_REPLY] where source_id in (select source_id from inserted)) WHERE CP_FORUM.id in (select source_id from inserted) END
